((Yan its Inu-Yasha & Tiamat change the spelling)) ((Where are the 
Decepticons?))
::After 2 days of setting a checking search perimeters::

::Liono::
"If we miss anything now it wasn't meet for us to find." Liono fires up the 
subspace scanning sadillite.

::Sadillite::
As the Sadillite moves into position the lens activates and starts Subspace 
X-Ray scanning Earth as it slow peels way each layer and anything else it 
hits as it scans the unexpecting Alliance, and  Pred Base.

::Teltran 1 & 1/2::
Planetary scanning will be done in 48 hours.

::Koj::
"This blows we have 48 hours to kill." Koj takes of his necklace and looks 
at the guitar pick. As he picks up his Guitar tunes it. Starts to play 
"Thing are starting to accelerate in to stopping away trouble bubbling."

::Liono::
Sets down in a chair.

::Dark Convoy::
Draws his sword "Liono when the last time you learned a matrix attack? 
Youï¿½re getting lazy."

::Liono::
Liono stands draws his sword "What about it why are you so concerned about 
the matrix's secrets and my mastery of them?"

::Dark Convoy::
Rush Liono thinking soon little brother your purpose will be fulfilled  as 
well as my destiny.

::Liono::
Liono shoots a fire rocket and follows with his sword in a Cross-Slash "Fire 
Cross."
